Dear KC mods and modesses.

I have a serious issue with two individuals of this site's moderation.

Recently, in the past 48 hours, I posted twice, both posts earning five-hour bans from the mod "Kurwa".

The first time, I was calling out a pedo in a thread where he was discussing various illegal pedophile activities of his and saged him twice (see pic 1). None other than "Kurwa" responded with the following ban (see pic 2).

Then, being nice, I let that ban lapse without too much complaint. Imagine my shock, when the next day, having made a useful and very-much discussed thread on the Kurdish situation in Turkey, I was banned! (>>/int/11909766)

Hinweis / Notice
  1. Diese Site ist für Leute mit gesundem Menschenverstand und Humor gedacht, die mit Sarkasmus, Ironie und Zynismus umgehen können. Denk gründlich nach, bevor du etwas, das hier gepostet wurde, für bare Münze nimmst.
  2. Darüber hinaus enthält sie teilweise Dinge, die nur für ein erwachsenes Publikum geeignet sind. Wenn du minderjährig bist, geh bitte woanders hin.
  3. Bevor du hier irgendwas tust, mach dich mit den Regeln vertraut.
Glaubst du, das bekommst du hin? Ja | Nein
  1. This site is meant for people with common sense and humor who can deal with sarcasm, irony and cynicism. Think carefully before you take something that was posted here at face value.
  2. Furthermore, it contains some things that are only suitable for an adult audience. If you're a minor, please go somewhere else.
  3. Before you do anything here, familiarize yourself with the rules.
